definition: to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image

sentences.english: Pirating used to be commonplace in this country.
sentences.chinese: 在这个国家，非法翻印曾经是司空见惯的。

sentences.english: These photos were reproduced by courtesy of the General Electric Company.
sentences.chinese: 这几张照片是得到通用电气公司允许而翻印的。

sentences.english: These pictures are reproduced by courtesy of the General Electric Company.
sentences.chinese: 这些照片是得到通用电气公司的许可而翻印的。

sentences.english: We obtained special permission to reproduce the book in our magazine.
sentences.chinese: 本刊得到特别许可翻印这本书。

sentences.english: These photos were reproduced by courtesy of the General Electric Company.
sentences.chinese: 这些相片是征得“通用电气公司”的许可而翻印的。

sentences.english: Please note the copyrights of the materials and do not reproduce without the author's permission.
sentences.chinese: 请留意版权，未经作者同意不能翻印。

definition: to set in print/to diffuse/to publish
manuscript copy of a book (before the printing press)
to copy (a text) from person to person/(of a text) to be transmitted by copying
the amount of books etc printed at one impression/print run
to go to press/to submit for printing
